quoteText:
<li>Except as provided below, you and we agree that any cause of action, legal claim, or dispute between you and us arising out of or related to these Terms or Instagram ("claim(s)") must be resolved by arbitration on an individual basis.
Class actions and class arbitrations are not permitted.
you and we may bring a claim only on your own behalf and cannot seek relief that would affect other Instagram users.
title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

tosdr.case: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
